name: MarBL
body:
### [Canu](https://github.com/marbl/canu)

A fork of the [Celera Assembler](http://wgs-assembler.sourceforge.net/wiki/index.php?title=Main_Page "Celera Assembler") designed for high-noise single-molecule sequencing (such as the PacBio RSII or Oxford Nanopore MinION).

[github.com/marbl/canu](https://github.com/marbl/canu)

***

### [Harvest Suite](http://harvest.readthedocs.org)

Core-genome alignment and visualization tools for quickly analyzing thousands of intraspecific
microbial genomes.

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marbl/gingr/master/html/img/harvest.png)

[harvest.readthedocs.org](http://harvest.readthedocs.org)

***

### [Krona](https://github.com/marbl/Krona/wiki)

Interactively explore metagenomes and more from a web browser.

![](http://ondovb.github.io/logo_krona.png)

[github.com/marbl/Krona/wiki](https://github.com/marbl/Krona/wiki)

***

### [Mash](http://mash.readthedocs.org)

Fast genome distance estimation using the MinHash algorithm.

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ondovb/ondovb.github.io/logo_mash.png)

[mash.readthedocs.org](http://mash.readthedocs.org)

***

### [MetAMOS](http://marbl.github.io/metAMOS/)

A metagenomic assembly analysis pipeline.

[marbl.github.io/metAMOS](http://marbl.github.io/metAMOS/)

***

### [MHAP](https://github.com/marbl/MHAP)

MinHash Alignment Process (MHAP, pronounced MAP): locality-sensitive hashing to detect long-read overlaps and utilities.

[github.com/marbl/MHAP](https://github.com/marbl/MHAP)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
